about_the_game:
About the demo version


We've released a new Free Demo version for you try out!

Please not that some features and contents are locked in the demo version. These will only be available in the full version of the game.

NOTE: Some content in this demo may differ from the full version of the game. Data from Demo version cannot be transferred to the full version of the game.

*For a limited time, the full prologue demo will be available from October 14 to October 21.*

Description


The game is set in Guanajuato, Mexico. During select periods, the player controls Tressa, who is striving to lead a normal life. Explore a world where nothing seems real, use everything at your disposal to escape this twisted reality, uncover your past, present, and future, and reconnect with the deepest moments of your life.

Cult -Vein- is a psychological horror game with a heavy focus on storytelling, set in Guanajuato, Mexico. Explore a world where every interaction has consequences, affecting both the environment and the player. The atmosphere will keep you on edge at all times.

Gameplay


Weapons may help you fend off the dreadful entities stalking you from every corner, door, or beneath your feet, but they are always lurking; such things cannot die. You’ll be able to pick up key items, interact with the environment, and search for objects that may help you escape this nightmare.

name: Cult -Vein- Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Vega 6, 1 GB. / Equivalent.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cult -Vein- is a psychological horror game about post-cult trauma, featuring a girl who is striving to lead a normal life. Unravel the story behind her as you struggle to survive in a twisted world where every interaction has consequences.
